data.message: Trump is an idiot,  and it is embarssing for me to admit as much because I'm a republican.  You've never held back Eminem and I'm proud to be a fan of yours.  We all have to put country over party,  and trump is destroying this country.

replies.message: No he isn't check the stock market dip shit. Check the employment rate dipshit...
